summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4786 for the improvement of 2nd Avenue from Yesler Way to 4th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain others streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55281, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
